code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{sendMessage}from'../store/chatSlice';import{AgentType}from'../types/api';import AgentSelector from'../components/chat/AgentSelector';import MessageBubble from'../components/chat/MessageBubble';import'../styles/ChatPage.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatPage=()=>{const dispatch=useDispatch();const{messages,isLoading,agentType}=useSelector(state=>state.chat);const[inputMessage,setInputMessage]=useState('');const handleSendMessage=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!inputMessage.trim()||isLoading)return;try{await dispatch(sendMessage({message:inputMessage,agentType:agentType||AgentType.NORMAL}));setInputMessage('');}catch(error){console.error('Failed to send message:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-interface",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"SQL RAG Assistant"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-controls",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AgentSelector,{})})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"messages-container",children:[messages.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"empty-state",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Welcome to SQL RAG Assistant! \uD83D\uDC15"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Ask me anything about your database."})]}):messages.map(message=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MessageBubble,{message:message},message.id)),isLoading&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading-message",children:"Thinking..."})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{onSubmit:handleSendMessage,className:"input-form",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"input-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{value:inputMessage,onChange:e=>setInputMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Ask me about your database...",rows:3,disabled:isLoading}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",disabled:!inputMessage.trim()||isLoading,className:"send-button",children:isLoading?'Sending...':'Send'})]})})]})});};export default ChatPage;
